description:
The Mindy Project's Shulman & Associates is starting to have a serious retention problem.《明迪烦事多》的Shulman&Associates将会面对一个重大离别。

Adam Pally, who stars as Dr. Peter Prentice on the Fox comedy, will be leaving the show in early 2015, TVGuide.com has confirmed.《电视指南》报道，在剧中扮演Dr. Peter Prentice的男演员Adam Pally将会在2015年年初离开这部电视剧。

As first reported by TVLine, Pally's plan to exit the series after this season's 13th episode was reportedly set some time ago. The actor recently signed a deal with ABC Studios to produce projects for broadcast, cable and new media. He is expected to make return appearances to The Mindy Project as his schedule permits.TVLine最先曝出此消息，Pally将会在本季13集之后离开。而离开的原因是他已经和ABC工作室签约。好消息是，他稍后在时间允许的情况下将会回归《明迪烦事多》。

title: Adam Pally明年离开《明迪烦事多》
